author: Lauren Roberts
title: Rent, taxes, power bills slashed to help NT businesses cope with coronavirus impact
description: Territory businesses hurting from the COVID-19 pandemic will have their payroll taxes slashed and power bills halved, as part of a further $180 million rescue package from the NT Government.
content:
Posted 
April 08, 2020 16:43:29
NT businesses hurting from the COVID-19 pandemic will have their payroll taxes slashed and power bills halved, in a $180 million rescue package announced today by Chief Minster Michael Gunner.
